nop.name: Invalid Instruction
nop.desc: Instruction has been removed, behavior needs to be updated

unlock.name: Unlock
unlock.desc: Run as many instructions as possible. Use wait instructions to throttle execution.

lock.name: Lock
lock.desc: Run one instruction at a time

label.name: Label
label.desc: Labels can be jumped to from anywhere in a behavior

jump.name: Jump
jump.desc: Jumps execution to label with the same label id

wait.name: Wait Ticks
wait.desc: Pauses execution of the behavior until 1 or more ticks later

args: Where to continue if the types differ

args: Where to continue if the entities differ

args: Where to continue if the entities differ

Where to continue if Value is smaller than Compare

separate_coordinate.name: Separate Coordinate
separate_coordinate.desc: Split a coordinate into x and y values

combine_register.desc: Combine to make a register from separate parameters

separate_register.name: Separate Register
separate_register.desc: Split a register into separate parameters

add.name: Add
add.desc: Adds a number or coordinate to another number or coordinate

sub.name: Subtract
sub.desc: Subtracts a number or coordinate from another number or coordinate

mul.name: Multiply
mul.desc: Multiplies a number or coordinate from another number or coordinate

div.name: Divide
div.desc: Divides a number or coordinate from another number or coordinate

modulo.name: Modulo
modulo.desc: Get the remainder of a division

Drop off items at a unit or destination

If a number is set it will drop off an amount to fill the target unit up to that amount
If unset it will try to drop off everything.

args: Item and amount to pick up
dopickup.name: Pick Up Items

Picks up a specific number of items from an entity

Will try to pick up the specified amount, if no amount
is specified it will try to pick up everything.
